Review Text: I stayed at K-tavern (by chance) during my recent visit to Lagos; 5-stars all around.   The staff were exceptional! Their attentiveness to my needs as a guest of the Tavern was amazing. The interior spaces were *Chefs Kiss*. It exuded minimalism, modern, and clean!  I will definitely stay there again. Highly recommend!  ***Its adjacent to some other prominent hotels in Victoria Island; however, its exact location is a bit obscure (I later discovered this was intentional by design to ensure a particular demographic of patrons).
